text: 'in aladhin frru minkum -ya ashab- muhamad ean alqital yawm altaqaa almuminun walmshrkwn fi ghzw "'uhd", 'iinama awqehm alshaytan fi hadha aldhanb bibaed ma eamiluu min aldhnwb, walaqad tajawuz allah eanhum falam yeaqbhm. 'iina allah ghafur llmdhnbyn altaybyn, halim la yeajl min easah baleqwbt
